ygData.subject: RE: Lambent bits and pieces
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Interesting.  I ve always thought that your faction (how far into ready to attack you are) affected the aggro radius and rate.  I was pulling for a L30s
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 10 Feb 2000, Ryan Honeyman wrote:
>
> > hoping at level 29 they won't aggro on me anymore, but not sure. I'm sure
> > they don't aggro on level 30's. Too bad, seems like such a good place for
> > exp and items at my level, but I can't make it to any of the good rooms. So
> > you'll have to con everything and see if something is not indifferent to
> > you. Anything not indifferent will jump you.
>
> Nope, heh. These little pricks still find it in their heart to attack
> me anytime they see me. You will never be high enough level for these
> twerps not to attack, unfortunately.

Interesting. I've always thought that your faction (how far
into "ready to attack" you are) affected the aggro radius and
rate. I was pulling for a L30s group in Sol A a couple nights
ago. The young goblins completely ignored me. The Inferno
and Solusek goblins would aggro on me after a few seconds, but
I was able to pull singles from a room with 3 Sols without
having to lull. Fire goblins took about 5 seconds before
they'd aggro on me. This was at level 45.

You're saying these things all attack you the moment they see
you?

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
